title: The Vampire's House of Pleasure Part 2
description: Lies. Debauchery. Betrayal.Trapped in 1797, Violet is desperate to return to her own time. She believes the beautiful mansion in the French Quarter holds the key, so she pretends to be an indentured servant in order to search. But when Violet discovers its master is a vampire--a gorgeous, decadent vampire with an appetite for blood--she runs. However, the New Orleans of the past is not the one Violet knows. She's taken by a brutal slaver and hauled to a primitive cabin. As Violet struggles to stay alive, she believes all hope is lost. But the sensual brooding vampire she ran from isn't about to let her go...This book is not meant to be read as a standalone. See The Vampire's House of Pleasure: Part One on Amazon Kindle and Kindle Unlimited! Part Three releases October 2015.
author: Rose Wynters
